content:
3.120. 
Indivisible property 
1. The property to be divided shall not include items intended to meet the needs of minor children, as well as the spouses' clothing, personal effects, their personal moral rights and property rights relating solely to the person of the spouse. 
2. The property provided for in paragraph 1 of this Article for the needs of minor children shall be transferred without compensation to the spouse with whom the minor children remain living, and other property of a personal nature shall be transferred to one and the other.
